item.title: Teaching
item.description: Even the all-powerful Pointing has no control about the blind texts it is an almost unorthographic life. One day however a small line of blind text by the name of Lorem Ipsum decided to leave for the far World of Grammar.

item.title: News & Activities
item.description: Hi, I am Raula Kula, a member of the SE Lab @NAIST, as an Assistant Professor. As an empirical researcher, I use various techniques on libraries, software visualizations and software ecosystems. Check out my recent publications and academic activities.
